name: Game Of Dice Throne [GMTK2022]
description:
! HELP THE KING !

The board palace has been invaded by killers and they will not stop until they kill one of the royalty

Help The KING to retrieve his wife and son and avoid killers to win the GAME OF DICE THRONE

A game about the great escape of the king from the killers while saving his relatives All on the grace of holy randomness of dice

Play as 6 player / 2 players / single player
